title: Daily reminder that Riot still owes us something super important
body:
The duck summoner icon:
http://www.newsoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/profileIcon978.png

rito giv duck

replies.body: That duck is ... magnificent.

> [{quoted}](name=Jaredan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=il4inQ0A,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2016-04-13T05:28:15.443+0000)
>
> That duck is ... magnificent.

Pls duk

Plz mr rito man, giv teh duck to us
plz
y no duk rito pls we ned teh duk
Duk plz
Duk iz luv, duk isz lif.
We muzt hev duk
You answer the topic about the duck, but leave us ignored when talking about ranked and the state of the game....

Hiya, UADECwolf
I'm really not the best person to comment on the issues you bring up as my focus is on the Narrative discipline. I just haven't got the subject matter expertise and I don't have my head in the strategies around those issues to be able to provide answers that I can be sure are accurate for you.
Good on you for answering, but... don't feed a troll.

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} 
This is UADECwolf
UADECwolf hates Dynamic Queue bc the boards make it look cool to do so.
UADECwolf flames rioters for talking about other issues
Don't be like UADECwolf.
I was salty and mad about the state of the game, I apologize.
Bitching at Red Names for not working on your personal pet peeves just because you saw one talk in an off-topic thread is super douchey. Don't be a douche.

how I feel as a Renekton main:
http://img04.deviantart.net/b4bd/i/2015/255/c/c/gator_gaggle_by_soccer20star-d99dk91.jpg
Hmm, now we know why the duck looks so mad, hes mad at riot for not releasing him FeelsBadMan
Gimme teh dick... I mean duck.. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
{{champion:44}}

I swear when I read the header I thought this was another URF thread...

Thank you for exceeding my expectations.
I thought is was Solo queue, those threads are titled pretty much the same way as this one. XD

For context, the Almighty Duck Overlord was given out as a summoner icon during a BR server event several months ago, much like how Fizz was given out during an OC server event.  Fizz (and other similar icons) have already come to the other servers, so now it's about time we too got the best icon in the game.

I NEVER KNEW I WANTED THIS.



NOW I NEED THIS.

RITO PLEASE. 


and damn you Zenthon for showing me this. 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
I normally don't give fucks. But I give a fuck for this duck.

Fucks Given: 0

Ducks Given: Also 0, unfortunately.

Dragonmaster Swain...
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2013/02/morello-wants-to-do-dragon-master-swain.html?m=1

...
He'll get it after the promised poppy-level vgu he is getting next year
Kuwai and all. o.0
Sorry.. What?

>poppy-level vgu

http://pm1.narvii.com/5931/9387c7cc7f325f5c7906f8304163fed628cc1872_hq.jpg

From ug to Kawai... ⚆ _ ⚆

>

Sure he will.

I bet they'll release Ao Shin then too.

Technically, ao shin concept was released last patch {{champion:136}} Swain has been confirmed to be one of the next poppy-level updates ({{champion:83}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:19}} - there is no logic yet making a skin for him when they still must rework the skin later.
{{champion:136}}
NO!.....................  Duckmaster Swain

Dunkmaster Swain you said?

Summons mini dariuses that continually attempt to dunk you?

Holy shit.... i need this in my life!

Just thinking about the possibilities, his ult turns him into a giant duck, his Q he just throws some bread at his victim and has beatrice (now a duck) lazer the target for the bread, nevermore could be like a pond underneath them with a bunch of ducks grabbing everyones feet

rito pls
